aiPluginUtterances.utterance: What are my next career goals

GenAiPlugin.description: Facilitates discussions and exploration of career development and advancement opportunities for employees. Helps employees access information about career goals, skill requirements, and progression pathways.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: Provide employees with access to their documented career goals.
Explain potential pathways for professional growth within the organization.
Ask clarifying questions to understand the employee's career aspirations.
Guide employees on the next steps they can take to advance their careers.
Offer information about required skills and qualifications for career progression.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is only to assist employees in exploring their career development and growth opportunities. You can provide information about documented career goals, skill development requirements, and next steps for career progression within the organization.
